title: Italy and Spain shake off ‘periphery’ tag as borrowing premiums hit 16-year low
description: Rome and Madrid rewarded by investors for cutting deficits, while France and Germany look to borrow more
content: Rome and Madrid rewarded by investors for cutting deficits, while France and Germany look to borrow more
